attributes.action: remove the devillisly tasty flavour of strawberry from the neopolitian flavour of ice cream
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the evil campain of strawberry ice-cream has gone too far this time in its quest to be the best flavour in its category. Chocolate RULES!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
